name: LineWise
long_description:
LineWise is building an AI assistant for manufacturing teams to diagnose and resolve production issues, from defects to breakdowns. 

It mines machine manuals, historical incidents, and maintenance notes to rank likely root causes and provide step-by-step guidance to fix them. As technicians work through the steps and confirm outcomes, LineWise learns from every fix, turning each repair into a reusable playbook and recommending preventive actions to reduce future downtime.
one_liner: AI Agent to troubleshoot manufacturing issues
